segments.text: John , I was talking to the travel agent about where we might be taking our vacation this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going fishing in Alaska with my friend , Mark .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What's wrong with heading out with Mark for vacation ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You and I have been together for a whole year , and our vacation time should be about the two of us !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Who made that rule up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: With that attitude , I don't really think we have much more to discuss here .
segments.speaker: S1
